articles.title: Apple pulls ICEBlock from the App Store
articles.description: Apple has removed the “Waze but for ICE sightings” app ICEBlock from its App Store, as reported previously by Business Insider. A post from its developer relayed Apple’s App Review message about the ban, saying, “We just received a message from Apple's App Review that #ICEBlock has been removed from the App Store due to […]
articles.author: Richard Lawler
